name: A.L.F.I.E's GAME
description:
RAAR games is very proud of its latest invention, A.L.F.I.E., an Artificial Intelligence that will develop their games for them while they rest! 

Unfortunately for them, due to some carelessly programming, A.L.F.I.E. has become self-conscious and now it has only one objetive: to develop the ultimate virtual escape room. And it needs testers, whether they are wilful or not...

Cooperative puzzle-solving and fps multiplayer experience for PC, developed as project from RAAR members under URJC Master in Computer Graphics, Virtual Reality and Games.

RAAR website https://raar-games.github.io/Portfolio/
